summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests that exercise Django's formset infrastructure. It includes custom form and formset classes used to simulate various scenarios, and a collection of test cases that verify formset creation, initial data handling, collective validation, ordering and deletion support, maximum form limits, error aggregation, HTML rendering helpers, empty formset behavior, multipart encoding, media handling, and binding semantics.
business_intent: To validate and safeguard the behavior of Django formsets across a wide range of use‑cases, ensuring that formset validation, management form processing, rendering utilities, and edge‑case handling work correctly and remain regression‑free.
